testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

paragroup.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check .

testgroup.title: Ignition spark test

test1.ptxt: Check all spark plugs for condition and type referring to Spark Plug Inspection .
If OK, perform ignition spark test referring to Ignition Spark Check .

testgroup.question: Is spark emitted from all spark plugs?

test1.ptxt: Perform DTC check referring to DTC Check .

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

test1.ptxt: Check ignition coil assemblies for electrical connection.

testgroup.title: Ignition coil assembly power supply and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check ignition coil assembly power supply and ground circuits for open and short.

testgroup.question: Are circuits in good condition?

test1.ptxt: Check ignition coil for resistance referring to Ignition Coil Assembly (Igniter and Ignition Coil) Inspection .
Check CKP sensor referring to Camshaft Position (CMP) Sensor and Crankshaft Position (CKP) Sensor Inspection .

paragroup.ptxt: Tighten CKP sensor bolt, replace CKP sensor or CKP sensor plate.

test1.ptxt: Check CMP sensor referring to Camshaft Position (CMP) Sensor and Crankshaft Position (CKP) Sensor Inspection .

action.ptxt: Tighten CMP sensor bolt, replace CMP sensor or intake camshaft.

test1.ptxt: Check ignition trigger signal wire for open, short and poor connection.

testgroup.title: A known-good ignition coil assembly substitution

test1.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ignition coil assembly and then repeat Step 2.

testgroup.question: Is check result of Step 2 satisfactory?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and then repeat Step 2.

test1.ptxt: Check initial ignition timing and ignition timing advance referring to Ignition Timing Inspection .
Confirm that knock sensor circuit is in good condition referring to DTC P0327 / P0328: Knock Sensor Circuit Low / High .
Check oscilloscope waveform of knock sensor signal referring to “Reference waveform No.12” under Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits .

action.ptxt: Check CMP sensor, CMP sensor rotor tooth of camshaft, CKP sensor, CKP sensor plate and/or input signals related to this system.
Substitute a known-good knock sensor and recheck.

servinfosub.title: Reference
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to “Reference waveform No.17 to 20” and “Reference waveform No.24 to 26” under Inspection of ECM and Its Circuits for waveform of ignition trigger signal.
